attributes.action: Let the UK vote on Scottish independence. Let England vote them out!
attributes.additional_details: The largest employer in Scotland is the UK civil service, put simply Scottish workers are calculating English workers tax bills, but they themselves have different tax laws to England, this is immoral. Get Scotland politically away from England and with th EU they desire
attributes.background: Scotland has a disproportionate number of MP's in the UK Parliament, measured by square miles, number of electors or constituency sizes. They also have their own 'devolved' Scottish Parliament which is something England does not have.
